TopicTitle: Darth Vaders Imperial Navy R&D-new concept Jul 9.

Articles.Content:
The five of us(see below) are finishing the antares mod started by nutt007

Link to the DL for all of my source files:https://www.dropbox.com/s/ptk30y54kmw23tb/Castor%2030%20Source%20Files.zip

File format is .dae/.skp

license(when its done): you may re distribute copies of the part,but only on this thread. Idk what nutt wants as a license, I'll ask him.

euRWB

">Javascript is disabled. View full album

I have an idea for a new mod, a surface/space materials bay. it would be a box with a clear animated door that has some substance inside, when the animated door is open you would get a science report. i would like members of the community to design blobs/shapes of a certain size (yet to be determined) for the mod as my skills in modeling are limited to geometric shapes. it would be small (enoght to fit on the side of AIES Explon-d) and modular (baseplate which acts as an unmanned MPL,attach the modules to it to preform science,then reset)

Edited July 9, 2014 by DarthVader
As soon as our unity guy (Crasher925) gets back on the computer, this project will get off the ground!
Good to see you're starting something, I hope this one goes smoothly, now that Crasher925 has at some experience in unity. I look forward to progress.
Oh nice! More rockets!

before a forum mod tells u. source and licencse also a pick even if rought would be nice.
It's not even a mod yet. Just the model.

i encountered a problem with the model, im fixing it now. I had accidentally made the center of the stack hollow and couldn't extrude thecylinder both directions in sketchup for some strange reason. I got the nozzle done and am working on texturing it now.

Its an upper-stage SRB.

So what's the status? I've just re-discovered an Athena replica mod with which it'd go really nicely. Athena IC and IIC use this instead of Orbus 21D. I could ensure compatibility between the two mods, and it'll be faster than waiting for an Antares lower stage to be made.
well im waiting for darth to texture the model so that dragon can do the model configs
i can't texture crasher, it should be simple to do by hand as the think is black with a white nozzle.
Could you not make it look too catroony? "Black with a white nozzle" would look bad if there weren't any details, that sort of simple texture would've looked bad by 0.13 standards.
